name: 丽娜·德克尔
introduction: Southern belle Leanna Decker is a glamour model born in Kentucky who grew up in Greenville, South Carolina. Her career, popularity and followership quickly soared up when she earned the 2012 Cybergirl of the Year title from Playboy. Sassy, sweet and sexy, the voluptuous model can also be a firecracker red-head who can switch between riding a jet-ski and holding a rifle inside a shooting range. As an animal lover she also spend her time advocating for their rights. With beautiful curves, green eyes, and scarlet mane Leanna looks to further her modeling career and travel around the world.
